And so today, during the March for Life, please support women's lives (and by extension, choices), and donate to @PPact #WeWontGoBack
At that young age, it seemed illogical to me to advocate for "life" as "existence" #WeWontGoBack
Because even at 13, it was clear to me that women's LIVES mattered, and were being ignored #WeWontGoBack
I figured out my mistake: at 13 I thought advocating for abortion rights /was/ a pro-life position #WeWontGoBack
I was utterly confused, and I shouted back, "of COURSE I'm pro-life!" He was also confused, looked at me like I had 3 heads #WeWontGoBack
In the mid of most heated part of our "debate" (again, we were 13, it was pretty tame) he yelled at me for not being pro-life #WeWontGoBack
I was friends with a boy who was against abortion and Roe v. Wade, and one day we got into it #WeWontGoBack
I was 12 or 13, and very new to some of the language surrounding abortion rights #WeWontGoBack
When I was in middle school, we had fun "debating" one another on political issues in the halls #WeWontGoBack
